item.title: Blog: HEIR meeting 2025-04-17
item.description:
Here are the notes and video recording from the HEIR meeting on 2025-04-17.

Hongren Zheng gave an overview of the mgmt dialect which handles ciphertext management in the compiler. This talk starts at 27:11. The slides can be found here.

item.title: Blog: HEIR meeting 2023-08-29

item.title: Blog: HEIR meeting 2023-07-18
item.description:
The third HEIR meeting was 2023-07-18 (notes).

We decided to schedule future meetings every two weeks, with alternating focus on MLIR and Hardware. See the meeting calendar to join. (direct link to the calendar)
